entry.title: Wednesday: Mainly sunny. High minus 21.
entry.summary: Mainly sunny. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 21. Wind chill minus 38 this morning and minus 25 this afternoon. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 11:00 AM MST Wednesday 15 February 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Light snow. Low minus 24 with temperature rising to minus 20 by morning.
